Reviews.Title: Sharp Wide Angle/Quality
Reviews.Author: Iggy ""King of the Yellow River""
Reviews.Content: I had to replace some of my security camera's in the past, the construction in other camera's was poor.  This Camera is superb. the construction is solid. No outside plastic material. The focus is sharp, and the wide angle aspect gives an excellent view without compromise. The night time led lights are abundant and gives a very respectful total darkness picture.  None of the other cameras I have owned had as many led's as this one. All said, the price is a bargain. You should not be disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony CCD Technology, Color DSP
420 TV lines high resolution;
28 built-in long range IR illuminators; IR illuminator effective up to 54 feet
3.6mm lens for wide view;0 lux with IR LED
Weatherproof housing. Water, dust and crush resistant glass coating
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Vision Bullet Security Camera Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD Wide View Angle Lens 28 Infrared IR Leds for CCTV DVR System with bonus Power Supply IRX36S C97
